data.eml:eml: Ortalis remota: a forgotten and critically endangered species of chachalaca (Galliformes: Cracidae) from Eastern Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Silveira, Luís Fábio, Tomotani, Barbara Mizumo, Cestari, César, Straube, Fernando C., Piacentini, Vitor De Q. (2017): Ortalis remota: a forgotten and critically endangered species of chachalaca (Galliformes: Cracidae) from Eastern Brazil. Zootaxa 4306 (4): 524-536, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4306.4.4
